entries.assist_15: Form up, ordered rows! Move it!
entries.assist_12: Steady... we need to keep them pinned down.
entries.assist_7: They'll regret taking on the Empire!
entries.hit_target_16: Surrender and the Empire may have mercy on you!
entries.hit_target_13: Halt your hostilities or I'll shoot again!
entries.hit_target_12: That was just a warning shot.
entries.hit_target_9: This is your last warning. Surrender or die!
entries.hit_target_8: Cease hostilities or I'll blast you again.
entries.hit_target_5: Reporting in... Hostile is being apprehended.
entries.ally_15: Are you alright? Let me take care of this.
entries.ally_13: You are in violation of Imperial Law.
entries.ally_12: This is no place for civilians.
entries.ally_10: Stop, by order of the Empire!
entries.ally_8: Quick, call in an enemy attack!
entries.ally_6: Stand back, I'll handle this situation.
entries.ally_1: That sort of action isn't authorized!
entries.help_10: I'm in need of immediate assistance!
entries.help_8: Calling all reinforcements! Under heavy attack!
entries.help_7: Reporting in... the situation is out of our control!
entries.help_6: Calling in for immediate support! Taking fire!
entries.help_5: Reporting in... the situation has not been contained! Send assistance!
entries.help_2: Awaiting tactical support! Repeat, I am awaiting immediately tactical support!
entries.attacked_16: Cease your attack and surrender in the name of the Empire.
entries.attacked_12: Drop your weapon and put your hands in the air!
entries.attacked_11: Get down on the ground! Now!
entries.attacked_6: Calling in... enemies have been sighted!
entries.attacked_5: Enemy action! Calling in, calling in.
entries.attacked_3: Calling in... send reinforcements, I'm under attack!
entries.hit_9: You are under arrest for attacking an Imperial Stormtrooper!
entries.gloat_12: Reporting in... these hostiles are under control.
entries.gloat_9: Reporting in... the situation has been resovled.
entries.gloat_8: The resistance didn't put up that much of a struggle.
entries.gloat_7: Calling in... things are clear at my location.
entries.gloat_6: In the name of the Empire.
entries.gloat_5: These hostiles were not a problem.
entries.gloat_2: Reporting in... cancel reinforcements, target is down.
entries.death_14: In the name of the Empire...ugh!
entries.death_8: Quick, call in for reinforcem... AGHh.
entries.threat_16: Better call for reinforcements, they're approaching.
entries.threat_15: Requesting permission to take out target...
entries.threat_14: Calling in, hostile is continuing to approach. Request permission to fire.
entries.threat_12: Stand back or I will fire.
entries.threat_11: If you do not cease all activities, you will be fired upon.
entries.threat_10: You are in direct violation of Imperial law. Move away.
entries.threat_9: Reporting in... hostile closing, I am about to engage.
entries.threat_8: I'm warning you, I have permission to fire if needed!
entries.threat_7: Don't cause any trouble or I will fire.
entries.threat_6: Hands in the air, weapons down, or I'll shoot!
entries.threat_5: Don't make any sudden moves. Move away.
entries.threat_3: By Imperial order, back off NOW or I will shoot.
entries.threat_2: Calling in... send over reinforcements, we got trouble.
entries.threat_1: Last warning, move away or be fired upon.
entries.bye_mean_15: Calling in... looks like the target is departing.
entries.bye_mean_14: Looks like the target's going. Call it in.
entries.bye_mean_13: Target is leaving... cancel those reinforcements.
entries.bye_mean_12: Stand down... looks like the target is departing.
entries.bye_mean_9: Move along. You are not permitted to return.
entries.bye_mean_7: Move along, and don't come back.
entries.bye_mean_6: Reporting in... request permission to fire on sight next time this target is sighted.
entries.bye_mean_5: By Imperial order, stay away from here in the future.
entries.bye_mean_4: Do not return to this area, or we will consider you a hostile target.
entries.bye_mean_3: Reporting in... potential hostile is withdrawing.
entries.bye_mean_2: The potential hostile is leaving. Call it in.
entries.bye_mean_1: Move out of the area. Now.
entries.bye_mid_12: I have to get back on duty.
entries.bye_mid_9: I'll return to my post now.
entries.bye_mid_8: Move along, and I'll get back to my duties.
entries.bye_mid_7: I'll return to my duties now.
entries.bye_mid_5: Reporting in... returning to my post.
entries.bye_mid_4: Calling in... returning to my station.
entries.bye_nice_16: Good day. Report any rebel activity you come across.
entries.bye_nice_12: Imperial Stormtroopers are at your service. Good day.
entries.bye_nice_11: If you need help, just call us in.
entries.bye_nice_10: Let me know if you need assistance in the future.
entries.bye_nice_8: Calling in... yes, sir... I have to return to my post.
entries.bye_nice_6: Calling in... yes, I'll make sure they get away safely.
entries.bye_nice_5: Time to return to my post.
entries.bye_nice_4: Contact me if you need anything.
entries.bye_nice_2: Don't hesitate to contact us if you encounter problems.
entries.bye_nice_1: Move along. You are permitted to return as needed.
entries.hi_mean_15: Reporting in. Suspicious subject on approach.
entries.hi_mean_14: Calling in... potential target approaching. Awaiting instructions.
entries.hi_mean_13: Move away from my position now.
entries.hi_mean_12: Are you authorized to be here?
entries.hi_mean_11: This is a restricted area. Move along.
entries.hi_mean_10: Move away.  This is a restricted area.
entries.hi_mean_9: Move away from here, or you may be fired upon.
entries.hi_mean_7: Do you have authorization to be here?
entries.hi_mean_2: You are required to move along.
entries.hi_mean_1: You're not authorized to be here.
entries.hi_mid_14: Please move along. I am on duty.
entries.hi_mid_7: Reporting in... everything is under control here.
entries.hi_mid_6: Calling in... another random civilian is wandering by.
entries.hi_mid_4: This is a restricted area.  Watch what you do here.
entries.hi_mid_3: Warning, this is a restricted area.
entries.hi_nice_15: How can I be of service, citizen?
entries.hi_nice_14: Reporting in... everything is clear at this position.
entries.hi_nice_13: All right, how can I be of assistance?
entries.hi_nice_10: What can I do for you?
entries.hi_nice_9: I don't need to see your ID.
entries.hi_nice_8: Things seem stable at this post.
entries.hi_nice_7: I'm awaiting further instructions from my commander.
entries.hi_nice_6: What do you need from me?
entries.hi_nice_3: Reporting in... this sector is clear.
entries.hi_nice_2: Is there a problem that I need to help you with?
entries.flee_16: Calling in... this position is compromised. Withdrawing!
entries.flee_9: Can't hold this position anymore! Retreat!
entries.calm_16: Looks like the hostiles are gone.
entries.calm_13: All right. Report any further problems immediately.
entries.calm_10: Stand down, the danger is over.
entries.calm_9: Reporting in... yes, sir. No further activity.
entries.calm_8: Reporting in... false alarm, looks like.
entries.calm_7: Reporting in... no reinforcements needed after all.
entries.calm_6: Reporting in... looks like there's no danger.
entries.alert_11: Could be trouble, better call in.
entries.calm_5: Call it in, looks like everything's quiet.
entries.calm_4: All right. Things have settled down here.
entries.calm_3: The situation is normal, but stay alert.
entries.calm_2: OK, calm down. Hostiles have moved away.
entries.flee_2: Calling in... send reinforcements, we can't hold 'em.
